original_title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street in Concert
overview: In July of 2001, the concert edition of Stephen Sondheim's Broadway masterpiece, Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street, was presented at San Francisco's famed Davies Symphony Hall, with Patti LuPone and George Hearn starring. The world-class San Francisco Symphony, under the direction of Rob Fisher, provided the accompaniment for this powerful, sold-out concert.
title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street in Concert
